title: Was the Odessa Shooter a Beto O’Rourke Supporter?
subtitle: The usual political game-playing about a gunman's supposed political affiliations took place online after the August 2019 shootings in Midland-Odessa, Texas.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The August 2019 Odessa shooter was "a Democrat Socialist who had a Beto sticker on his truck."
